title: Book Online at Movement Health
cleaned_text: Book an Appointment To our amazing patients at Movement Health! Booking can be done through our online portal HERE or by calling/texting us at 519-567-2888. If you can't see your ideal time please call and leave a detailed message with your name, phone number, preferred practitioner and treatment date/time. You may also email us at info@movementhealth.ca to get in contact with us. NO CANCELLATIONS WILL BE TAKEN VIA VOICEMAIL - Please text 519.567.2888 or email info@movementhealth.ca if you need to cancel or reschedule your appointment. For any medical emergencies please call 911. Dr. Allison Kivisto is not currently accepting new patients. If you have been a patient of hers and have not been seen in the last 3 months, please book a re-assessment/new complaint. All new patients will be directed to Dr. Colleen Poulakas - she is AMAZING. CANCELLATION POLICY Please note that all our practitioners book one-on-one appointments - time slots are reserved specifically for you. If you need to cancel or change your appointment within 24 hours of the appointment time the following charges will apply to your account. 1st late cancellation / no show / late change or reschedule = $25 2nd late cancellation / no show / late change or reschedule = 50% of visit cost 3rd late cancellation / no show / late change or reschedule = Full cost of service We thank you for your patience and support and can't wait to see you in the office! Welcome to our online booking site Chiropractic [Read More](2-description) Chiropractic is a non-invasive, hands-on health care discipline that focuses on the musculoskeletal system. Chiropractors practice a manual, hands on approach to muscular dysfunction, pain and injury by providing a diagnosis after a comprehensive evaluation. Treatment and preventive care for disorders related to the spine, pelvis, nervous system and joints is then recommended and may include referrals to other healthcare disciplines including but not limited to primary care physicians (family doctors), physiotherapists, dieticians etc. or modification of activity and even referral for additional imaging studies to be completed (Xrays, CT scans, MRI, diagnostic ultrasounds etc.). Dr. Kivisto will work with your other health care providers to enhance your treatment when necessary. Chiropractors use a combination of treatments, all of which are predicated on the specific needs of the individual patient. For many conditions, such as lower back pain, chiropractic care is frequently the primary method of treatment. Where other conditions exist, chiropractic care may complement or support medical treatment by relieving the musculoskeletal aspects associated with the condition. Chiropractic care may also be used to provide symptomatic relief for patients with chronic conditions. According to patient surveys, by treating the musculoskeletal elements of such disorders, chiropractic treatment has been shown to improve the general well-being of the patient. Fascial Stretch Therapy [Read More](13-description) Fascial stretch therapy helps deal with mobility and chronic pain issues. It is a relatively new form of treatment that involves the therapist performing assisted stretching techniques with a client on a treatment table or floor. Comfortable straps help stabilize the limb or part of the body that is not being stretched in order to facilitate complete relaxation and to enhance the effectiveness of the stretches. Classes Clinical and Athletic Taping Workshop September 10th, 2022 - Looking for a course we are offering? - Click here! Massage Therapy Massage therapy is manual manipulation of the body's soft tissues (muscle, connective tissue, tendons and ligaments) to enhance a person's health, well being and overall function. Free Consultation Not sure who to book or if any of our treatments would benefit you? Find your practitioner of choice and schedule a 15 minute consultation. It is FREE and you will be able to speak directly to the healthcare provider about any questions you may have before booking an initial assessment. Psychotherapy [Read More](22-description) Psychotherapy is a mental health discipline that provides a judgement free environment for clients to explore their relationships, environments, and identify patterns that may be holding them back from the life they wish to have. Recognizing these struggles and taking this courageous step is just the beginning of the journey toward deeper self-discovery and adaptive change. Psychotherapy / counselling can help with anxiety, depression, emotional regulation, family conflict, grief, motivation, relationship, stress and substance abuse. Book your session right away if you believe psychotherapy is a good fit for you or schedule a one on one FREE consultation if you have any questions or concerns before booking. Naturopathic Medicine [Read More](23-description) Naturopathic medicine uses the traditional healing wisdom of "nature cure" - accessing the healing power of nature to support the body's own innate ability to heal. Naturopathic medicine views the body's physiology as interconnected, rather than isolated systems. The treatment strategy is based on normalizing functionality by bringing the body's physiology and biochemistry back into balance. Naturopathic doctors look at your patterns and symptoms, your health history and lifestyle, physical exam, and laboratory testing to interpret what it's telling us. Virtual Psychotherapy [Read More](24-description) **These sessions with our talented Psychotherapists are done completely, securely and privately online from the comfort of your home (either by phone or through our private virtual video conferencing)** Psychotherapy is a mental health discipline that provides a judgement free environment for clients to explore their relationships, environments, and identify patterns that may be holding them back from the life they wish to have. Recognizing these struggles and taking this courageous step is just the beginning of the journey toward deeper self-discovery and adaptive change. Psychotherapy / counselling can help with anxiety, depression, emotional regulation, family conflict, grief, motivation, relationship, stress and substance abuse. Book your session right away if you believe psychotherapy is a good fit for you or schedule a one on one FREE consultation if you have any questions or concerns before booking. Virtual Naturopathic Medicine [Read More](25-description) **These sessions are done completely online and will be completed over the phone or through our private and secure online video conferencing portal** Naturopathic medicine uses the traditional healing wisdom of "nature cure" - accessing the healing power of nature to support the body's own innate ability to heal. Naturopathic medicine views the body's physiology as interconnected, rather than isolated systems. The treatment strategy is based on normalizing functionality by bringing the body's physiology and biochemistry back into balance. Naturopathic doctors look at your patterns and symptoms, your health history and lifestyle, physical exam, and laboratory testing to interpret what it's telling us.
